Earl Potters is an AI Engineer based in Boulder, CO. He studied Computer Science and specializes in building AI Agents. He is passionate about robotics and artificial intelligence.

An active blogger, as evidenced by his social media presence, Earl has contributed to various projects including work at Missio AI. His GitHub showcases numerous repositories related to robotics, AI, and blockchain development, including contributions to CityDAO's parcel contracts.

Connect with him on [X](https://x.com/SRacoon23) and [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/earl-potters-b2b306187/).
